meanings.definition: A bitter alkaloid found in cacao plants.
meanings.sent1: The theobromine in cacao plants gives them their bitter taste.
meanings.sent2: I learned that theobromine is a compound present in cacao plants.
meanings.sent3: The theobromine in cacao plants must be the reason why chocolate tastes bitter.
meanings.sent4: The theobromine in cacao plants is like the unsweetened part of a chocolate bar.
meanings.sent5: The theobromine in cacao plants is what makes dark chocolate so distinct.

meanings.sent1: After consuming theobromine, I felt more awake and alert.
meanings.sent2: Many people enjoy the effects of theobromine in chocolate.
meanings.sent3: The theobromine in chocolate seems to give me a little energy boost.
meanings.sent4: The theobromine in chocolate is like a gentle wake-up call for the body.
meanings.sent5: I could feel the theobromine in chocolate working its magic on my energy levels.
